channel.title: Data Science Wiki
channel.description: Recent content on Data Science Wiki

item.title: About
item.description: In a world packed of information, it is challenging to be aware of the latest technologies and innovations. For that reason, this wiki urge as a strategy to keep studying and summarize important concepts related to Data Science. In a word, it is a handy glossary of not so trivial terms that supports my Data Science profession. Who am I? Name: InÃªs Gomes Location: Porto (Portugal) Academic Background: BSc./MSc. in Informatics and Computing Engineering

item.title: Future Content
item.description: Topics that I’m not confortable with, but that I’d like to explore: Machine Learning: Transfer Learning Active Learning Natural Language Processing: Word Embeddings Enconders and Decorders Data Engineering: Spark and Hadoop Kubernets

item.title: Links to Knowledge
item.description: Content Blogposts Resources and Tutorials Papers Books Podcasts Newsletters and Blogs Courses Internet is a powerful resource to share knowledge. With diverse contributors around the world and distinct channels to disseminate information (e.g., audio, text, video), it is crucial to select the most appropriate ones according to our purpose. So, on this page, I select the most valuable links to knowledge, that I have encountered during my research, study or spare time.
